invite.headline: Build your team
inviteMessage: Jeg er på {{brandName}}, søg efter {{username}} eller besøg get.wire.com.
inviteMessageNoEmail: Jeg er på {{brandName}}. Besøg get.wire.com for at forbinde dig med mig.
legalHoldActivated: This conversation is under legal hold
legalHoldDeactivated: Legal hold deactivated for this conversation
legalHoldDescriptionOthers:
Legal Hold has been activated for at least one person in this conversation.
All messages will be preserved for future access, including deleted, edited, and self-deleting messages.
legalHoldDescriptionSelf:
Legal Hold has been activated for your account.
All messages will be preserved for future access, including deleted, edited, and self-deleting messages.
Your conversation partners will be aware of the recording.
legalHoldMessageSendingMissingConsentMes: You cannot send this message because you have at least one outdated device that does not support legal hold. Please update all your devices or remove them from the app settings. [link]Learn more[/link]
legalHoldModalText: All future messages will be recorded by the device with fingerprint:[br][fingerprint][br]This includes deleted, edited, and self-deleting messages in all conversations.
legalHoldWarningMessage: The conversation is now subject to legal hold.[br]Do you still want to send your message?

modalAccountDeletionMessage: Vi vil sende dig en besked via email eller SMS. Følg linket for at permanent slette din konto.
modalAccountLeaveGuestRoomMessage: Samtaleoversigten vil blive slettet. For at beholde det, oprett en konto næste gang.
modalAccountLogoutOption: Slet alle dine personlige informationer og samtaler på denne enhed.
modalAccountNewDevicesMessage: Hvis du ikke gjorde dette, slet enheden og nulstil din adgangskode.

modalAccountRemoveDeviceMessage: Din adgangskode er krævet for at fjerne denne enhed.
modalAppLockForgotMessage: The data stored on this device can only be accessed with your app lock passphrase. If you have forgotten your passphrase, you can reset this client.
modalAppLockSetupChangeMessage: Your organization needs to lock your app when {{brandName}} is not in use to keep the team safe.[br]Create a passlock to unlock {{brandName}}. Please, remember it, as it can not be recovered.
modalAppLockSetupMessage: The app will lock itself after a certain time of inactivity.[br]To unlock the app you need to enter this passphrase.[br]Make sure to remember this passphrase as there is no way to recover it.
modalAppLockWipeConfirmMessage: All your conversation history will be permanently deleted from this client. You may then log in again.
modalAppLockWipeConfirmTitle: Do you really want to reset this client?
modalAppLockWipePasswordTitle: Enter your {{brandName}} account password to reset this client

modalAvailabilityAvailableMessage: You will appear as Available to other people. You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
modalAvailabilityAwayMessage: You will appear as Away to other people. You will not receive notifications about any incoming calls or messages.
modalAvailabilityBusyMessage: You will appear as Busy to other people. You will only receive notifications for mentions, replies, and calls in conversations that are not muted.
modalAvailabilityDontShowAgain: Do not display this information again
modalAvailabilityNoneMessage: You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
modalCallEmptyLogMessage: There were no calls to base the debug report on.

modalImproveWireMessage: I agree that {{brandName}} may create and use anonymous usage and error reports to improve the {{brandName}} App. I can revoke this consent at any time.

modalIntegrationUnavailableMessage: Tak for din interesse for bots. Tjenesten er i øjeblikket suspenderet, mens vi arbejder på den næste version. Bliv her.

modalLegalHoldDeactivatedMessage: Future messages will not be recorded.
modalNoAudioInputMessage: An audio input device could not be found. Other participants will not be able to hear you until your audio settings are configured. Please go to Preferences to find out more about your audio configuration.
modalNoCameraMessage: {{brandName}} doesn’t have access to the camera.[br][faqLink]Read this support article[/faqLink] to find out how to fix it.
modalPictureFileFormatMessage: Vælg venligst en PNG eller JPEG-fil.
modalPictureTooLargeMessage: Du kan bruge billeder op til {{number}} MB.
modalPictureTooSmallMessage: Vælg venligst et billede, der er mindst 320 x 320 px.
modalSessionResetMessage: If the problem is not resolved, [link]contact[/link] us.
modalUploadContactsMessage: Vi har ikke modtaget dine oplysninger. Venligst prøv at importere dine kontakter igen.

modalUserBlockedForLegalHold: This user is blocked due to legal hold. [link]Learn more[/link]

modalUserUnblockMessage: {{user}} vil igen kunne kontakte dig og tilføje dig til gruppesamtaler.
notificationMemberLeaveRemovedYou: {{user}} har fjernet dig fra en samtale
notificationSettingsDisclaimer: You can be notified about everything (including audio and video calls) or only when someone mentions you or replies to one of your messages.
participantDevicesDetailHeadline: Bekræft at dette passer med fingeraftrykket vist på [bold]{{user}}’s enhed[/bold].
participantDevicesHeadline: {{brandName}} giver hver enhed et unikt fingeraftryk. Sammenlign dem med {{user}} og bekræft din samtale.
participantDevicesOutdatedClientMessage: {{user}} bruger en gammel version af {{brandName}}. Ingen enheder er vist her.
preferencesAVNoCamera: {{brandName}} doesn’t have access to the camera.[br][faqLink]Read this support article[/faqLink] to find out how to fix it.
preferencesAVTemporaryDisclaimer: Guests can’t start video conferences. Select the camera to use if you join one.
preferencesAccountAppLockDetail: Lock Wire after {{locktime}} in the background. Unlock with Touch ID or enter your passcode.
preferencesAccountDataDetail: Send anonymous crash reports and basic data like version number and operating system to help {{brandName}} identify and solve issues in the app.
preferencesAccountDataTelemetry: Usage data allows {{brandName}} to understand how the app is being used and how it can be improved. The data is anonymous and does not include the content of your communications (such as messages, files or calls).
preferencesAccountLeaveGuestRoomDescript: Du vil ikke længere have mulighed for at få adgang til beskederne i denne samtale.
preferencesAccountMarketingConsentDetail: Receive news and product updates from {{brandName}} via email.
preferencesAccountReadReceiptsDetail: When this is off, you won’t be able to see read receipts from other people. This setting does not apply to group conversations.
preferencesAccountUsernameHint: Mindst to tegn. Kun a-z, 0-9 og _.
preferencesDevicesActiveDetail: Hvis du ikke kan genkende en enhed ovenfor, fjern den og nulstil din adgangskode.
preferencesDevicesFingerprintDetail: {{brandName}} giver hver enhed et unikt fingeraftryk. Sammenlign dem og bekræft dine enheder og samtaler.
preferencesDevicesRemoveDetail: Fjern denne enhed, hvis du ikke bruger den længere. Du bliver logget ud af enheden med det samme.
preferencesDevicesSessionDetail: Hvis fingeraftrykkene ikke stemmer overens, nulstil sessionen for at generere nye krypteringsnøgler hos begge parter.
preferencesOptionsBackupExportSecondary:
Lav en sikkerhedskopi for at gemme din samtale historik. Du kan bruge den til at gendanne historikken hvis du mister din computer eller skifter til en ny.
Sikkerhedskopi filen er ikke beskyttet af {{brandName}} end-to-end kryptering, så gem den it sikkert sted.
preferencesOptionsBackupImportSecondary: Du kan kun gendanne historik fra en sikkerhedskopi til den samme platform. Din sikkerhedskopi vil overskrive samtaler du allerede har på denne enhed.
preferencesOptionsCallLogsDetail: Denne information hjælper {{brandName}} Support med at diagnosticere opkaldsproblemer.
preferencesOptionsContactsDetail: Vi bruger dine kontaktdata til at forbinde dig med andre. Vi anonymisere alle oplysninger og deler ikke det med alle andre.
preferencesOptionsEnableAgcDetails: Enable to allow your microphone volume to be adjusted automatically to ensure all participants in a call are heard with similar and comfortable loudness.
preferencesOptionsEnableSoundlessIncomin: Enable to silence incoming calls when you are already in an ongoing call.
preferencesOptionsEnableVbrDetails: This makes audio calls use less data and work better on slower networks. Turn off to use constant bitrate encoding (CBR). This setting only affects 1:1 calls; conference calls always use CBR encoding.
preferencesOptionsPreviewsSendCheckbox: Lav previews til links du sender
preferencesOptionsPreviewsSendDetail: Previews kan stadig blive vist for link fra andre.
readReceiptsToggleInfo: When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
receiptToggleInfo: When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
searchFederatedDomainNotAvailable: The federated domain is currently not available.
searchInviteDetail: At dele dine kontakter hjælper med at forbinde til andre. Vi anonymiserer al information og deler det ikke med nogen andre.
searchListEveryoneParticipates:
Alle du er 
forbundet med er allerede i 
denne samtale.
searchListNoMatches:

Prøv at indtaste et andet navn.
searchNoContactsOnWire: Du har ingen kontakter på {{brandName}}. Prøv at finde folk ved navn eller brugernavn.
searchNoServicesManager: Services are helpers that can improve your workflow.
searchNoServicesMember: Services are helpers that can improve your workflow. To enable them, ask your administrator.

@username

by @username@domainname

setEntropy.moreEntropyNeeded: Please continue moving your mouse within the window to create enough entropy.
setEntropy.subheadline: Move your mouse as randomly as possible within the window below until the progress bar is 100% filled. This creates a random number which helps to protect your account and increases the overall security.

teamName.subhead: You can always change it later.
temporaryGuestDescription: Sikrer din virksomhed med krypteret gruppe chat og konference opkald.
temporaryGuestJoinDescription: Hvis du lukker eller opdaterer denne side, vil du miste adgang.
temporaryGuestJoinMessage: Denne samtale vil være tilgængelig for dig i 24 timer.
temporaryGuestLeaveDescription: Hvis du lukker eller opdaterer denne side, vil du miste adgang til samtale historikken.
temporaryGuestLeaveMessage: er ikke længere med i denne samtale.
timedMessageDisclaimer: Self-deleting messages will be turned on for all the participants in this conversation.

tooltipPreferencesPassword: Åbn en anden hjemmeside for at nulstille din adgangskode
unsupported.desktopOnlyMessage: Please use {brandName} on your desktop app instead.
unsupported.headlineIndexedDb: Your browser is in private mode
unsupported.subheadBrowser: Download the latest version of Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Opera or Microsoft Edge.
unsupported.subheadCookies: Aktiver cookies for at logge på {brandName}.
unsupported.subheadIndexedDb: {brandName} skal have adgang til lokal lagring til at vise dine meddelelser. Lokal lagring er ikke tilgængelig i privat tilstand.
userNotFoundMessage: You may not have permission with this account or the person may not be on {{brandName}}.
verify.headline: You’ve got mail
verify.subhead: Enter the verification code we sent to{newline}{email}
videoCallOverlayFitVideoLabelGoBack: double-click to go back to all participants
videoCallScreenShareNotSupported: Screen sharing is not supported in this browser
warningCallIssues: Denne version af {{brandName}} kan ikke deltage i opkaldet. Brug venligst
warningCallUnsupportedIncoming: {{user}} ringer. Din browser understøtter ikke opkald.
warningCallUnsupportedOutgoing: Du kan ikke ringe, fordi din browser ikke understøtter opkald.
warningCallUpgradeBrowser: Venligst opdater Google Chrome for at ringe.
warningConnectivityConnectionLost: Forsøger at forbinde. {{brandName}} kan muligvis ikke levere beskeder.
warningConnectivityNoInternet: Ingen Internet. Du vil ikke kunne sende eller modtage beskeder.
warningLifecycleUpdate: En ny version af {{brandName}} er tilgængelig.
warningNotFoundCamera: Du kan ikke ringe, fordi din computer har ikke et kamera.
warningNotFoundMicrophone: Du kan ikke ringe, fordi din computer har ikke en mikrofon.
warningPermissionDeniedCamera: Du kan ikke ringe, fordi din browser ikke har adgang til kameraet.
warningPermissionDeniedMicrophone: Du kan ikke ringe, fordi din browser ikke har adgang til mikrofonen.
warningPermissionDeniedScreen: Din browser skal have tilladelse til at dele din skærm.
